name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Support Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance SaaS applications across healthcare and financial sectors. Expert in API integration and data formats like XML and JSON, with a strong command of **C#**, **Python**, **PHP**, **JavaScript**, and **jQuery**. Proficient in web technologies including **HTML**, **CSS**, and HTTP protocols.
Skilled in troubleshooting and debugging tools such as **Wireshark**, **Fiddler**, and **Charles Proxy**, ensuring seamless application performance and compliance with industry standards. Hands-on experience in cloud-native deployments on **AWS** and **Azure**, implementing microservices, event-driven architectures, and CI/CD pipelines.
Demonstrated capability in developing AI/ML platforms and utilizing **Salesforce**, **SQL**, and **SharePoint** for enhanced reporting and analytics. Committed to compliance-driven development, aligning solutions with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards. Strong background in MLOps, encompassing model training, serving, and orchestration using MLflow, Airflow, and Kubeflow.
